metadata.title: CVE-2024-0639 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A denial of service vulnerability due to a deadlock was found insctp_auto_asconf_init in net/sctp/socket.c in the Linux kernelâ€™s SCTPsubsystem. This flaw allows guests with local user privileges to trigger adeadlock and potentially crash the system.
